items.summary: Update Page 1 (IntroPage) heading text color to exactly #722F37 (wine) using a Tailwind arbitrary color class or equivalent so it renders with that exact hex value.
Update Page 1 (IntroPage) body paragraph text color to exactly #E8E8E8 (unicorn silver) using a Tailwind arbitrary color class or equivalent so it renders with that exact hex value.

Update the Page 1 call-to-action element that navigates to the next page (the clickable CTA box on IntroPage) so its background color uses exactly #669966 (thyme), preserving the existing alpha/opacity behavior.
